package step3;

public class MyThread implements Runnable  {

	
	public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
		
		MyThread th = new MyThread();
		int num=5;
		for(int i=0;i<num;i++){
			new Thread(th,"线程A").start();
            Thread.sleep(50);
			new Thread(th,"线程B").start();
            Thread.sleep(50);
			new Thread(th,"线程C").start();
			Thread.sleep(50);
		}
		
		
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Thread th = Thread.currentThread();
		String str = th.getName();
		String stra="线程A";
		String strb="线程B";
		//System.out.print(str);
		if(str.equals(stra)){
			System.out.print("E");
		}
		else if(str.equals(strb)){
			System.out.print("D");
		}
		else{
			System.out.print("U");
		}
	}

}
